mapper.insert:
insert into realTimeStationInfo(stationId, stationName, rackTotCnt, parkingBikeTotCnt, shared, stationLatitude, stationLongitude) values
(#{item.stationId}, #{item.stationName}, #{item.rackTotCnt}, #{item.parkingBikeTotCnt}, #{item.shared}, #{item.stationLatitude}, #{item.stationLongitude})

update.foreach: update realTimeStationInfo set stationName = #{item.stationName}, rackTotCnt = #{item.rackTotCnt}, parkingBikeTotCnt = #{item.parkingBikeTotCnt}, shared = #{item.shared}, stationLatitude = #{item.stationLatitude}, stationLongitude = #{item.stationLongitude} where stationId = #{item.stationId}

mapper.select: select *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{stationLatitude}))*cos(radians(stationLatitude))*cos(radians(stationLongitude) - radians(#{stationLongitude}))+sin(radians(#{stationLatitude}))*sin(radians(stationLatitude)))) as distance from realTimeStationInfo having distance < 2 order by distance asc
select * from bikeStation where roadaddress like concat('%', #{value},'%') or detailaddress like concat('%', #{value},'%') limit 5
